channel.title: Garbage Collector on MrCoder
channel.description: Recent content in Garbage Collector on MrCoder

item.title: MiniJava
item.description: MiniJava The compiler we study in this part is a transpiler that goes from the MiniJava language to the C language. We will construct this transpiler using the OCaml language and Menhir for the syntactic analysis. To download the code : git clone --recurse-submodules git@github.com:lascar-pacagi/MiniJava.git.
